sentences.en: But a broader change is under way as the economic centre of gravity shifts eastwards.
sentences.cn: 但是因为经济重心东移,可能会带来更大的变化.

sentences.en: From Bristol we drove eastwards to London.
sentences.cn: 我们从布利斯托尔向东开车到伦敦.

sentences.en: Leaves are continuing to fall endlessly , and the Changkiang is rolling on eastwards.
sentences.cn: 无边落木萧萧下, 不尽长江滚滚来.

sentences.en: The article I wrote to help me move eastwards ultimately undermined my life in Istanbul.
sentences.cn: 那篇我为了东迁而写的文章最终却毁了我在伊斯坦布尔的生活.

sentences.en: The Changjiang River rolls on eastwards.
The fascists were coming eastwards swiftly, they said.
sentences.cn: 他们说,法西斯军正在迅速地向东推进.

sentences.en: The medical unit made its way eastwards.
They were pressing on eastwards towards the city's small airfield.
sentences.cn: 他们继续向东朝该市的小机场推进。

words.tran_cn: 东方的；向东的；从东方来的
